name: Tech & Innovation
description: A hub for alumni interested in the latest tech trends, gadgets, innovations, AI, cybersecurity, and everything digital.

name: Business & Finance
description: Discuss industry insights, market trends, investment strategies, and share advice with other alumni professionals and executives.

name: Startup Ideas & Innovation
description: A community for aspiring and current entrepreneurs to share, refine, and get feedback on startup ideas, MVPs, and business models.

name: Internship Postings & Mentorship
description: Help current students and fellow alumni by sharing internship openings, career tips, and mentorship opportunities.

name: Placement Guidance & Job Support
description: A resource center for final-year students and young alumni to get placement tips, resume reviews, mock interviews, and job leads.

name: College Life & Activities
description: Celebrate the vibrant campus life! Share stories, photos, fests, clubs, and everything that made college memorable.

name: Professional Development & Careers
description: A space for job seekers, professionals, and recruiters to share opportunities, host webinars, and mentor each other.

name: Alumni Events & Reunions
description: Stay informed about upcoming alumni events, virtual gatherings, and reunions. Coordinate meetups in your area!

name: Women in Leadership
description: A supportive community for female alumni leaders and professionals to share insights, mentorship, and success stories.

name: Campus Memories
description: Take a trip down memory lane—share photos, stories, and relive unforgettable moments from your university days.

name: Volunteering & Social Impact
description: For alumni passionate about giving back—share opportunities, organize drives, and collaborate on social initiatives.

name: Faculty & Research Connect
description: A space for academic alumni and faculty to share research work, collaborate on publications, or discuss academic developments.

name: Alumni Abroad
description: For alumni living overseas—network, share tips on life in your country, and connect with others in your region.
